Package ePortfolio

Class Investment

java.lang.Object
ePortfolio.Investment
Direct Known Subclasses:
MutualFund, Stock
public abstract class Investment extends Object
This represents a general investment with attributes such as symbol, name, price, and quantity. It provides methods to manage investments, including updating prices and managing book value.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected double
    bookValue
    The total book value of the investment, representing the cost basis.
    protected String
    name
    The name of the investment.
    protected double
    price
    The current price per unit of the investment.
    protected int
    quantity
    The quantity of the investment owned.
    protected double
    realizedGain
    The total realized gain from selling portions of the investment.
    protected String
    symbol
    The symbol of the investment, representing its unique identifier.

    • calculateInitialBookValue

      protected abstract double calculateInitialBookValue(int quantity, double price)
      Abstract method to calculate the initial book value.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity of investment.
      price - The price per unit.
      Returns:
      The initial book value.

    • sell

      public abstract double sell(int quantity, double price)
      Abstract method for selling investment.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity to sell.
      price - The sale price per unit.
      Returns:
      The gain from the sale, or -1 if the sale is invalid.

      Updates the realized gain for the investment.
      Parameters:
      gain - The gain from the sale to add to the realized gain.

    • calculateUnrealizedGain

      public double calculateUnrealizedGain()
      Calculates the unrealized gain for the investment.
      Returns:
      The unrealized gain (current value - book value).

      Adjusts the book value after a partial sale.
      Parameters:
      quantitySold - The quantity sold.
